title: Please undo the MF W changes
body:
edit: oops lol when i looked at the list it had it sorted based on "most improved" and MF is last on that cuz she dropped 2 spots apparently but regardless she has apparently performed worse than how she performed before the changes so along with my experience with the changes my point kinda-sorta still stands i guess? ^_^ 

She is now ranked as the worst adc on champion.gg after this supposed "buff" with the last patch LOL her early game has been nerfed so much already and this change has nerfed her one reliable way of fast pushing waves by keeping the attack speed running with the passive without wasting all of her mana early on from constantly having to recast it

I don't understand, the old W rewarded MF players who knew what they were doing by keeping it up for such a long time if they managed it properly and the mechanic of constantly switching targets to keep it running matched well with how she dishes out her DPS in fights (constantly switching targets to get the benefits from its damage) 

It is up much more later on in the game but I just hate how her early game clear was basically shot in the foot... so annoying

replies.body: No she's not...corki is the lowest right now...mf is 12 out of 18
corkie is that bad? i see him all the time.
corki has lowest winrate. lowest preformance is urgot followed by kalista.

> [{quoted}](name=BladeSteel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WIHA7yuP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-24T22:56:31.771+0000)
>
> No she's not...corki is the lowest right now...mf is 12 out of 18

oh oops lol when i looked at the list it had it sorted based on "most improved" and MF is last cuz she dropped 2 spots apparently but regardless she has apparently performed worse than how she performed before so that makes me sad and annoyed ;l

I said it when Patch 5.22 happened, MF would turn out weaker than before.  She was the ONLY ADC in the game that had her base AD NERFED instead of buffed.  She lost her niche of being a mixed-damage ADC.  Her AS got nerfed and her Grievous Wounds removed from her kit.

This should have been obvious when her only viable skill path was maxing E to abuse Thunderlord's, rather than her REAL harass tool: Q and her dueling/teamfighting tool: W.  It comes at no surprise to me that after E got nerfed, she's disappeared from the game entirely.

MF is my second most played champion, behind Soraka. Ironically enough, ricklessabandon has worked on both. I didn't welcome the MF W changes at all. I typically start W first, and alternate Love Taps quickly to push the lane, try and deny the enemy bot lane and hit level 2 faster. Not only that, but activating W and dueling with minions present to try and Double Up, helps so much more.

Now, you have quicker access to Love Tap, but less reliably. If the cd on hit goes down with cdr, Ezrea's Q and Lucian's E should too.

thank god i dont see mf as an ad carry anymore. thank jesus. 1-2 months of terror back in the preaseason. dominates lane with her superior bullying. wins late game with a single ult that does something like 6k damage. man. those were nightmares.
